thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 87 of 3057
thread.title: Boris Ayrapetov

author: Boris Ayrapetov
title: Boris Ayrapetov
text:
I was not sure what to expect but still loved all the service.
Convenience of car hire stock was like the most other companies.
But still very comfortable to compare and choose the best option.
All complicated prices are shown on the clean sheet.
I`ve got insanely fast my money back on the Insurance Event - like in a few days, not more.
Rentalcars.com answered my emails very quickly and very professionally.
